title: Initial stages of succession with 5 answer options

content.prompt: Which of the following statements correctly describes a typical trend during the initial stages of succession in a terrestrial ecosystem?

choices.label:
The amount of biomass and nonliving organic
matter decreases.

The litter layer becomes thinner because of
increased assimilation of nutrients by shrubs
and trees.
The storage of inorganic nutrients within individual plants decreases.
